sentence: Prohibition of child labor Suppliers should require their employees to provide proof of age prior to employment to ensure they meet local minimum working age requirements and to prevent the use of child labor.

Safety Precautions We provide employees with personal protective equipment and first-aid facilities required for their work, including noise-proof earplugs for apparel-production staff, dust-proof protective clothing for employees working in the down filling room, wire gloves for employees who do fabric cutting, and eyewash in the factories.
